Widget.name: Thumbnail
Widget.Description: Gets thumbnails from the given feed.

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: On-scroll loading container id
Option.Description: if set, on scroll-loading will be applied to the specific container instead of the entire window. You must set the css id of a scrollable element.

Option.name: Default URL thumbnail
Option.Description:
Specifies the thumbnail that will be displayed if there are no thumbnails available in the feed's hit.
Leave this field blank to have default, MIME type dependent thumbnails.

Option.name: Use CloudView thumbnails
Option.Description: Uses the fetcher to retrieve CloudView's computed thumbnails.

Option.name: Thumbnail Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the thumbnails (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Thumbnail Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the thumbnails (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Title
Option.Description:
Specifies the title displayed for each hit.
Leave blank to use the Title defined in the source feed.

Option.name: Hit URL
Option.Description: Specifies the link to create for each hit title.

Option.name: Hit URL Target
Option.Description: Specifies where to open the action for each Hit URL.
